title: Implement AsyncStorage trait for SurrealDB
description: Implement the AsyncStorage trait for SurrealDbStorage in graphrag-core/src/storage/surrealdb/storage.rs with all required methods: store/retrieve for entities, documents, chunks, list_entities, store_entities_batch, health_check, and flush.

title: Create SurrealDB schema definition
description: Create schema.surql file in graphrag-core/src/storage/surrealdb/ defining tables for document, entity, chunk, and relates_to with appropriate fields and indexes.

title: Add surrealdb-storage feature flag to Cargo.toml
description: Add the surrealdb-storage feature flag and surrealdb dependency to graphrag-core/Cargo.toml with kv-mem and kv-rocksdb features.

title: SurrealDB Storage Integration
description: Implement SurrealDB as a storage backend for graphrag-core, implementing the AsyncStorage trait. SurrealDB's native multi-model support (document, graph, relational, vector) aligns well with GraphRAG's data structures.

title: Add SurrealDB storage integration tests
description: Add integration tests for SurrealDB storage using RocksDB backend with tempfile, testing persistence across reconnections.

title: Integrate SurrealDB module into storage module
description: Update graphrag-core/src/storage/mod.rs to conditionally include the surrealdb submodule when surrealdb-storage feature is enabled, with re-exports for convenience.
close_reason: SurrealDB module integrated into storage module. All 16 unit tests passing.

title: Add SurrealDB storage unit tests
description: Add unit tests for SurrealDB storage using in-memory backend, testing CRUD operations for entities, documents, and chunks, plus health check functionality.
close_reason: Unit tests included inline in storage.rs, config.rs, and error.rs modules. All 16 tests passing.

title: Create SurrealDB module exports
description: Create mod.rs in graphrag-core/src/storage/surrealdb/ with module documentation and public exports for SurrealDbConfig, SurrealDbCredentials, SurrealDbStorage, and SurrealDbStorageError.

title: Create SurrealDB configuration types
description: Implement SurrealDbConfig and SurrealDbCredentials structs in graphrag-core/src/storage/surrealdb/config.rs with support for memory, rocksdb, and websocket endpoints.

title: Create SurrealDB error types
description: Implement SurrealDbStorageError enum in graphrag-core/src/storage/surrealdb/error.rs with variants for connection, authentication, schema, query, and serialization errors.
